hero.title: A Love That Lasts a Lifetime
hero.description: Jodohmu is where serious commitment meets modern matchmaking. We provide a heartfelt, premium service to help you find your soulmate in a way that honors your faith and values.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Jodohmu?
whyChoose.description: We are more than an app. We are your dedicated partners in finding a meaningful, lasting marriage.
whyChoose.secondary: With a dedicated matchmaker by your side, every introduction is curated with care, intention, and deep respect for your values.

trust.title: Serious, Vetted Community
trust.description: Every member is screened and guided by our team so you can invest your heart with confidence.

guidance.title: Personal Matchmakers
guidance.description: Dedicated advisors walk with you—from first conversation to the moment a proposal feels right.

curation.title: Purposeful Introductions
curation.description: Thoughtful matches focus on compatibility, shared faith, and long-term vision for a blessed marriage.

personalized.title: Personalized Matching
personalized.description: Our dedicated team gets to know you, your values, and your aspirations to find matches that truly resonate with your heart.

community.title: Serious Community
community.description: Join a private, vetted community of individuals who are genuinely ready for a meaningful, long-term commitment.

guided.title: Guided Meetings
guided.description: We facilitate meetings in a way that is comfortable, respectful, and true to your faith.

halal.title: Halal & Supervised
halal.description: All interactions are designed to be respectful, with options for supervised meetings.

philosophy.heading: More Than an App, We're Your Partners
philosophy.description: Finding a life partner is one of the most important journeys you'll ever take. At Jodohmu, we don't leave it to chance. Our matchmakers work with you like a dedicated team, providing guidance, support, and a human touch that algorithms can't replicate.

meetings.title: Meetings with Intention
meetings.description: Your comfort and safety are our top priorities. We arrange meetings in a controlled, respectful environment—be it our office or a trusted public space—often with the presence of an imam or family members, ensuring every interaction is dignified and purposeful.

testimonials.title: From Our Community
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from couples who found their lifelong partners through Jodohmu
